name: biosamples-minimal
title: BioSamples minimal checklist
description: Minimum required fields to submit a sample into EBI BioSamples database

name: plant-miappe
title: ENA Plant MIAPPE checklist for omics and phenomics interoperability
description: This is a checklist developed by MIAPPE group for Plant omics and phenomics interoperability
